title: Clifftop Pool Villa Indulgence in Uluwatu
description: Experience five-star Balinese luxury at its finest with an Uluwatu clifftop getaway at Banyan Tree Ungasan. Perfect for couples and groups alike, you will stay in your own spacious private pool villa, with the option to upgrade to stunning ocean views. Named Leading Luxury Resort - Indonesia in the 2019 Indonesian Tourism and Travel Awards, and deemed one of the Most Luxurious Hotels in the World by Forbes Travel Guide, Banyan Tree Ungasan is sure to be an unforgettable experience. Includes daily buffet breakfast, decadent two-course dining experiences, one luxurious 30-minute massage each, a cocktail at the amazing Ju-Ma-Na bar and a one-way private airport transfer.
offer_address: Banjar Kelod, Jl. Melasti, Ungasan, Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80364, Indonesia
